"Raising Class Level Cap to 80":
"This will explain how to unlock the Lv.80 cap.

・This must be done separately for each class.

・Upon reaching a certain level, a new Client Order
will be available from \"ARKS Administrator Koffie\", based on the class you are using.

By completing this Client Order, you will be able to unlock the Lv.80 cap for that class."

"To complete the Client Order, you will need to earn a particular title.

・Grind one ★13 or higher NT weapon natively equipped by the class to +35, or
・Raise a ★13 or higher pet to Lv.120.

In the case of a Successor Class, you will also need to obtain the following title:
・Complete the specific Class Client Orders given by the Class Trainer NPC labelled with I～IV.

※Can be redeemed at the \"Title Counter\"
※If you already meet the requirements, you can redeem
the title immediately."
